website_summaries.verdict: Cordless and convertible vacuum that provides a serious deep clean.
pros: Notable for having greater suction power than other models
Reduces congestion and allergies for those who live with pets

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Already lost its charge after a year of moderate use. This vacuum is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Koda

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst vacuum I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!! This is the worst vacuum I have ever bought!!!! The charger went bad after six months. When I called Dyson I was put through hours of trouble shooting to conclude the charger went bad. Then I was informed the warranty doesn’t cover the charger heck it doesn’t even cover a battery. DO NOT BUY VACUUM AND IF YOU DO DO NOT BOTHER WITH THE WARRANTY! Oh and customer service at Dyson is hit or miss. You may get a great person or you may get an attitude.
customer_reviews.author: Jamber-ee

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I have owned Dyson's before with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Has to go back. I started having problems with it 2 weeks after I received it, and now it won't charge at all. Very disappointed. I have owned Dyson's before with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing !
customer_reviews.text: This is the third in a line of purchased Dyson products; and had hoped for the flexibility of cordless with the power to suck up a lot of cat fur. After vacuuming the couch this device shut down. Item was delivered ten days ago. Not sure what happened but the motor died. Going back as soon as I can pack it up for return.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We have owned for a week and both my husband and myself are less congested in the morning. We have 2 cats and I wanted this Dyson specifically to get under our beds and other furniture. It amazes me how much it continues to pick up. Plus it is light and easy to take off the wall to do some quick clean up. It is so easy to dump directly into the garbage so no extra bags needed. Why did we wait so long to buy a decent vacuum? Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE battery life!!
customer_reviews.text: This was our fourth Dyson vacuum and unfortunately, we will be returning it. The suction is terrible on the lowest setting, so we have to use the high "max suction". On a full charge, the vacuum lasts an average of 8 minutes! Then it takes another 4+ hours to charge. This makes cleaning a nightmare! Between the suction and battery, I highly recommend avoiding this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: KnightTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Sad, just sad
customer_reviews.text: Seriously Dyson ??? You know that these can shock people yet you keep selling them ? That's not the same Dyson I always rave about. I have the plug in Animal and another of the handheld models, the other handheld doesn't shock me every 5 seconds. I would have just assumed it was broken and asked for a replacement but there are other who have complained of the same and were told by customer support it is a known issue if used in a cold dry environment. I would have given zero stars if I could. Sad, just sad.
customer_reviews.author: BillM

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Was SO EXCITED to get a really good vacuum to make my life easier. Charged it overnight and excitedly started vacuuming in the morning. It lasted 10 minutes. No joke. I am devastated; obviously not thrilled since I have a 2100 sq ft house. UPDATE - Someone told me you have to use this on the regular suction setting, not the MAXIMUM suction. So - when used on the regular setting the battery lasts about 35 minutes. When used on MAX, it lasts 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is also very poor. Will not FedEx parts so it literally takes ...
customer_reviews.text: i have had this product for about 4 months. The battery no longer works and is not covered under warranty. extremely misleading. Customer service is also very poor. Will not FedEx parts so it literally takes 2 weeks and then the problem was not resolved anyway. Unless you live close to a service center or can afford a $400 6 month disposable product, DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stroh

customer_reviews.title: Got a "lemon" and customer service is abysmal.
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, very light and great at getting under furniture WHEN IT WORKS! Mine regularly sends mild shocks through the charging port in the handle and the motor doesn't always kick on when the run switch is pressed. Customer service bombarded me with 15 questions over 3 emails as well as requesting all the information I filled in on the registration. I've resigned myself to the fact that they are going to keep asking questions and giving excuses until I give up... it might be working. It's sad that I've had such a negative experience as I believe the vacuum would be great if working properly. WOULD NEVER BUY ANOTHER DYSON!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Awful battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum in November of last year, a couple of months ago I noticed the battery charge starting less and less every time. 10 months later, after a full battery charge the vacuum does not work for more than 5 seconds. I called the Dyson customer service line and they sold me another charger; however, that was not the issue. The vacuum is definitely not worth the price, I had a small Black & Decker vacuum for which I paid 1/5 of the price which worked better and had a much better battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Monica G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is worth every penny! I have long hair and a lot of it so I shed like a dog. I vacuum all the time but never felt like my carpet was getting clean. Today I plugged this product in and tried it out! I pulled up so much dust and hair I’ve never been so excited to vacuum! I have a small 900sq/ft apartment so the battery life works for me, and I’m excited to use it on my car next! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware... Even though I love this vacuum and Have had this unit for almost 2 years, the battery has stopped holding its charge. I called Dyson and they stated battery isn’t covered in warranty because its “wear and tear”. Also, they stated that if we charge battery more then 3 hours, it wears down battery life faster. Keep in mind that wall holder for this vacuum automatically connects battery to charger on wall when stored so to avoid charging more then 3 hours we would have to store it off the storage unit. This is not very practical. A new battery is $129 so keep this in mind when buying an already pricey vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Baroniel

customer_reviews.title: Original review and update a year later
customer_reviews.text: Original review: Works very well! It got up so much dirt on the first run I was both disgusted and amazed! Continues to wow every time it is used. Update a year later: used to able to vacuum 2 rooms in our apartment before the battery does. Now we are down to about half a room and you can tell the suction is not as good. It sucks having to buy a new vacuum a year later when this one costs so much, and it used to do so well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Watrous

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Doesn’t stand behind their product
customer_reviews.text: Completely dissatisfied with Dysons Service. I bought this April 2018, and it quit working in December( wouldn’t keep a charge more than 2 mins) and now dyson tells me I am responsible for all charges needed for repair bc they can’t grant the warranty bc amazon is not an authorized reatialer. What a joke dyson is. I loved this product until this happened, and now this will definitely prevent me from ever buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work...very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Lousy product. Seldom works. I’ve tried everything I can think of. This product has only worked twice...the first time for about 2 minutes. The second time it ran about 10 minutes. Seems to clean well when it runs. But, I charge it, remove from charger and it doesn’t come on. Filters are clean and canister are clear. I thought I was doing something wrong, but it no longer even tries to come on after charging.
customer_reviews.author: ABC123XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off and on
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. I have a small apartment with one cat and one charge would clean the entire house. I’m a clean as I go type of person so there was no need to vacuum daily. About a week ago my product has basically stopped working. It holds a charge but it starts and stops every time I use it regardless of the setting. Highly frustrated because this was not a inexpensive purchase. I’m still paying for it and it doesn’t even work!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great vacumm, lousy battery run time.
customer_reviews.text: I love this V8 model because of its versatility, performance and ease of use. That said, I purchased the V8 model to get the 40 minutes of run time but I don't get that much time out of it. In fact, I don't even get 30 minutes, the claim the lower priced V7 states. So for me, spending close to $500 on a vacuum with such limited run time range seems a waste of money. Possibly I received a defective battery. Don't know.
customer_reviews.author: RickK

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the money. WILL NOT last..
customer_reviews.text: We owned this and LOVED it. It is convenient and it sucks good. It was wonderful. But it completely died short of owning it 2 years. And we maybe use it once every 2 weeks to vacuum rugs. We have all hardwood floors. Spoke to other people on social media that had this same problem. I see that it’s now 1/2 the price that I paid, but BE AWARE. It won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: OklahomaNick

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these in May 2017. Two years later the battery life diminished to the point that it only lasted about 10 minutes. So we ordered a new battery and installed it. There was no change. The battery on high suction lasts 10 minutes at most. On maximum suction it doesn’t even last a minute. Considering how expensive this vacuum cleaner was I would expect it to last more than 2 years. I would not buy another. I will eventually have to replace it. I will get another stick vacuum because I love the convenience, but it won’t be a Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie T. Woodring

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This thing has a battery life of 10 minutes. Literally, I timed it. The motor is also really weak. It is a horrendously overpriced gimmick and I hate it with passion. The fact that a piece of junk with 10 minutes of battery life can get through their quality control tells a score about the company that sell these vacuum cleaners. Will never buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mico Mrkaic

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service! piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson product. I had a corded vacuum for a long time and loved it. When it finally does, I purchased this cordless one on 4/28/18. Well, this morning, I tried to vacuum the house as normal and even though it showed a full charge, after 10 minutes of normal cleaning it shut off. It showed 0ne light and no power and the battery and unit were hot. Although I purchased it through Amazon and No Time Deals- Dyson will not honorr or help. This is the last time I purchase a Dyson product!!!I will go to Bissell - which by the way contributes a portion of sales to charity.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquigoddess

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but shave skin off
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great! Really great product. But shaved off my skin where the handle is because of the vibration. Not sure why a product so carefully designed had a problem like this to have the seam of two plastic pieces right at where the weight of the machine load on the hand. It seems quite easy and obvious to solve this problem. Honest, I think I’ve seen a couple of reviews stating this problem didn’t think of this will happen to me, but happened. I will from now on tape where the seam is but it really should be resolved and people shall be compensated for their injuries.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: For the most part this vacuum is great for the crazy cat lady
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this vacuum is great for the crazy cat lady. It picks up the cat hair fantastic off my area rugs. The size and weight are great for an older person to handle. I have found two cons that I don't care for, and that is the power button has to be held down the whole time you are using the machine, instead of just an on/off switch. For someone with arthritic hands this becomes painful. Also, I wish the dirt cup was larger so it didn't have to be emptied so often. Other than that is is amazing and the cord free is a definite plus!
customer_reviews.author: MRS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Wish I had bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: Can not say enough good things about this vacuum cleaner. It's sooooo nice to be cordless. Does a great job picking up dirt. I can reach so many more places. Under furniture, behing things, etc. Easy to empty at the end of a job (no bags to replace). My only regret is that I didn't get one sooner. I actually look forward to vacuuming. It also has other attachments so I can do smaller jobs like my car. Only two things that I don't like: after awhile it does get heavy in you hand if you are vacuuming for a period of time and I wish you didn't have to hold the button down constantly to vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: It is to bad because it did work well when it was working
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk! First one I got worked well for a couple of days then just stopped working. I was able to return it for a new one but the new only made it a few months. So now I have a $400 vacuum that does not work and I have had no help from either Dyson or Amazon to get it replaced or get my money back. I would stay away from this product if I where you. It is to bad because it did work well when it was working. Poor customer service and impossible to get help resolving my issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT FROM THIRD PARTY SELLERS!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this vacuum cleaner. On opening the box there was a strong, moldy smell. I thought first that the cleaning heads were used and I’m seeing dirt on it, but after a closer look it turned out to be mold. Not cool when you have asthma. I e-mailed Dyson customer service for replacement of the moldy parts. It turns out that it was sold by a third party seller, and Dyson can’t guarantee that it’s even an authentic Dyson. Manufacturer’s warranty doesn’t work with items like this. DO NOT BUY FROM THIRD PARTY SELLERS!
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Mom

customer_reviews.title: SHOCKS ME, customer service no help
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works great, however it shocks me while using it. Google this - many others have had the same issue and they REFUSE to take responsibility. The issue is, the charging port is too close to where you place your hand while vacuuming. I emailed them and they basically said "try wiping it down with a dryer sheet" and when that didn't work they basically told me that it's harmless, it's not an electric shock, it's a static shock. I still don't want to be hurt while vacuuming (the shocks do hurt!). Terrible customer service. I have since bought a shark vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with Dyson customer service. The power head wasn't working properly and though I have had this vacuum for almost 2 years I called Dyson to see if I could get help with parts and they ran the problems through the computer and said it was power head. She then said Dyson has 2 year warranty and she would send out a new power head. Wow just like that I had a new power head and vacuum is great again. Thanks Christin at Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Tari Anding

customer_reviews.title: Good, but gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, although running it on max power makes the engine way too hot. I called Dyson about this and they told me that's how it is and that you shouldn't really ever need to run on max. Not true - I find running it on max is often needed. The wall mount is great, being able to break it down to a small hand-held vacuum is awesome (which really helps me do my stairs in my house), so really my only issue is how stupidly hot the vacuum gets.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Really Works on Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Amazing suction! Dog hair came right off suede-like couch with one swipe. Attachments extremely fast & easy to change out. Minimum suction, lasts up to 45 min Cons: with Max suction, run time is reduced to about 25 minutes *Still worth every penny. Bought for $200 off price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Irle

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE WORLDS BEST VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through every vacuum type over the last year experimenting. I have a lot of carpet and I also detail my own cars. This vacuum can clean every room in my house, including pets hair covered beds and bathroom rugs, as well as 3 cars without running out of battery. I use the low power mode for 70% of the house and full power for high traffic spots. Suction is perfect. 30 minutes of run time seems modest. I think it lasts longer. 5 hour charge time is false. Mine charges in 3 hour from nothing. Takes 90 minutes to charge back up after cleaning my entire house. This thing made me enjoy vacuuming. 🤓
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Larsen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I have three dogs, one of which sheds if you just look at her. I have to use this thing every single day to combat the fur. It works fabulously! I can certainly tell a difference on the hardwood and carpet once I am finished cleaning. I've bought a cheaper one before, but it didn't work well, this one though, works better than my corded vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, battery only lasts a few months
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum felt cheap right out of the box. It's flimsy and made of cheap plastic. However, it worked well for about 4 months, then the battery died. Won't hold a charge at all, so the vacuum is useless. We called Dyson and were told they would send us a new battery. After a month we are still waiting. We have a cordless Shark vacuum in our RV that is much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Update November 15, 2018, 16 months after purchase ....battery life is terrible. Can no longer use max suction mode. Will only last 30 seconds on that mode. Additionally, the stick wand is coming apart. I contacted Dyson and they are replacing it but its been a month so far and it still hasnt arrived...supposedly it will be here next week. So, in the meantime, my vacuum isnt very useable. Nothing they will do regarding the battery. I felt I needed to update my original review. For a $450 vacuum, it should last more than a year and half. Very disappointed. Cheaply made parts. July 2017 original review....Love this vacuum!! Amazing power for a cordless. Very convenient, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Delanecpa

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy this?!
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. God. I am so glad I bought this vacuum. I have 1 ridiculously large FURRY cat and 3 dogs that shed a terrible amount. This vacuum SUCKS it all up. Best vacuum purchase I have made. Ever. Easy to change attachments to clean upholstery or the stairs. It’s lightweight. Super easy to empty. And the wall mount is genius! It charges in the wall mount and you just pull it out and go! We will see the durability over time, but I am definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Scratches Floor and Battery Only Lasts a Few Min
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum at first. First the charge kept decreasing. Now I can't do my whole house in a charge which isn't useful (and it's a small place). Only lasts about 5 min if I'm lucky. It also has somehow worn down (I do nothing out out the ordinary with it) and it scratches my floors. Just put new floors in and didn't realize for a while and have permanent scrapes. I've emailed back and forth and no resolution so far. VERY frustrating for a $450 vacuum that's 1 1/2 years old and gets used about once a week (low usage).
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Cordless V8 Animal
customer_reviews.text: Provides the amazing performance for which Dyson is known. This is my second Dyson vacuum, (the other still works perfectly after 10+ years but I wanted something smaller/cordless) and I couldn’t be happier with both of them. Easy to maintain/clean, very powerful suction and excellent air filtration.
customer_reviews.author: schmirretti

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 4 1/2 months and died
customer_reviews.text: For the $299 I paid I figure it costs me 44 cents per minute for the time I used it before it died Not a good but, I have had 3 Dyson cord animal units and had BAD luck with all of them, in fact have one in my garage right now with a bad clutch costs of $250 to repair, It is going to the trash. NO MORE DYSON'S FOR ME
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: Will not charge
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum about 1 month. At first I loved it!! But shortly thereafter, every time I use it after it has been on the charging station for more than 24 hrs, it only pulsates before finally quitting altogether. Very disappointed. For the price you pay for this vacuum, one would expect it to last way longer than 1 month!! Update: Since getting a new vacuum from Amazon in place of the faulty one, I have been very pleased! The replacement works great and I do LOVE to vacuum now! Amazon was easy to work with and customer service was GREAT! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Received unit with faulty battery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum new from Amazon. I own two other Dyson vacuum cleaners which are awesome. This unit arrived with a faulty battery that will not charge. The picture shows the blinking red light of death which indicates a faulty battery. How can an expensive vacuum cleaner company ship a unit with a battery that is faulty? Poor quality control. Dyson is willing to ship me a new battery but it will be 14 business days before arrival. You can say I am less than pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Dobson

customer_reviews.title: FAILS QUICKLY AFTER INITIAL RETURN PERIOD!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these. Unfortunately, three months later, the one I purchased for myself will not hold a charge, and I cannot return it. This is a $400 item. Quality is very poor if the item fails this quickly. VERY DISAPPOINTED in Dyson. I had been a huge promoter of their products. An item of this price from this manufacturer should have lasted much, much longer. Very disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is not what I thought. It's TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Great with one huge exception! On high suction setting you get less than 7 mind of use. I used a non powered brush to clean very little dirt from my Tahoe''s floormat. It died in 8 minutes on high suction. Not enough time to even come close to finishing. I called the customer service and was told on high suction you only get 7 mind of use... I have i small condo, can't even finish the stairs and kids room.... Sadly this is getting returned. I had high hopes....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum ever! My husband and I could not agree on a canister or an upright. This is the best of both worlds! We have a dog who sheds constantly and this little baby gets every last hair ball. I LOVE not having to mess with a cord, and the battery lasts long enough for me to get our entire 5 bedroom house--if I'm quick about it! The suction is great on deep shag carpet as well as bare floor. This is seriously a miracle machine! We've had it about three months now and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For a couple of years I’ve had to replace the old vacuum I had. It lasted as long as the warranty. The most recent vacuum had started to malfunction and no amount of cleaning it gave me clean carpets. I kept debating wether to get this Dyson or not. But I was tired of having to replacing cheaper vacuum models. Immediately upon using the difference was immediate, the carpets felt like they were new. It even picked up the cat litter that I was struggling to get with the older off brand vacuum. It has a 3 year warranty, which is added value for me
customer_reviews.author: L. Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing for our household
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing addition to our day to day cleaning routine. Perfect for the small jobs either hard surface or carpets. Also used for cleaning drapes, furniture, cars, etc. My whole family hates cleaning our stairways with our primary vacuums, this made it easy and quick. This is not a primary vacuum replacement if you have a house over 2000 sq ft. nor does it have the suction my corded Dyson has. What it does extremely well is simplify your life with smaller ad-hoc jobs or when a more delicate vacuum is needed such as drapes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bucky

customer_reviews.title: Bette than a broom!!!!’
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had one and I loved it so got one. I love it so far. Note: I use this instead of a broom not to vacuum my entire home. It was meant for small spaces and quick cleanups. It does a great job for daily pick ups. When I need to clean my entire house I pull out my central vac and go to town. If you want something that makes your life easier and cleans better then a broom this is a great option. I also have a dog and a cat and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMichele3

customer_reviews.title: With every penny
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this vacuum enough. I am SO happy I bought it. A little pricey for me, but it has been worth every penny! So easy to maneuver, to store, to clean,...everything about it is so convenient that it makes vacuuming so much less of a chore. Even emptying the vacuum is easy! It is compact so it is easy to store and very lightweight so it is easy to access whenever you need it. The battery holds charge for a long time as well. Would highly recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: When spending $400 on a cordless vacuum, I would expect the battery to hold its charge for more than 5 months. The company did replace the battery, but we're having the same issue. Now on our second battery, I went from being able to vacuum my entire downstairs to about 10% of that space now before the battery gives out. I can't even complete one whole room without having to wait to let it recharge! This product is not at all worth the money paid for it and now customer service is not willing to do anything to make this right. I will not buy another Dyson product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only last 7 minutes
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got only last 13 minutes at the max suction mode. I thought the item was defective since it said 40 minutes last. So I replaced it. The second one I got can only last 7 minutes. I can’t even finish half of the carpet of my one bedroom apartment. I just sold my animal ball upright so I may replace again since I have nothing to replace. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ku

customer_reviews.title: Too much suction power
customer_reviews.text: This product is incredible on hardwood floors. However, the suction force is so high (it has two settings and I'm talking the lowest setting) it won't work on my new and high-quality carpet. It actually will not move its sucking so hard. I can not believe I spent $300 on a vacuum that can't be used on carpet- I'm disappointed. It should have a lower setting so you can actually use it on carpet. It should be advertised for hardwood floors only. If I hadn't opened it and used it I would return it and get a vacuum that works on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Evans

customer_reviews.title: Will shock you constantly when using it
customer_reviews.text: It is crazy that this vacuum shocks me constantly while using it and the responses to the many other reviews saying the same thing from dyson is so poor. It is painful to vacuum with this and this isn't a cheap vacuum. I can't believe they blame the environment of your house instead of taking ownership of their product that is obviously poorly designed. I will not be buying another Dyson product based on how their customer service has been responding to people about this shocking issue.
customer_reviews.author: jason welty

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of them and both didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Worst sweeper I have ever purchased. Bought one for christmas. Stopped working returned it bought another one and it has stopped working and it is past the return window. It is complete piece of junk. It will sweep for about 5 minutes and then it stops because it gets hot and then you have to wait an hour. Same as the first one. I am stuck with a sweeper that cost a fortune and does not work. What a joke!! Of course i can not get a refund !! I just want a sweeper that works!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my Dyson on Feb2020. It worked well, it does not hold up too much charge but suction power is good if put in maximum suction mode. Today it started working in an intermittent manner it works and it stops working, very disappointing. Would not recommend-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on the hype, batteries don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Animal V8 1.5 years ago for a small 1,900 sq ft office with vinyl floors and carpeted offices. Maybe used the unit 2-3x's per month.. after a year unit started to last less and less on a full charge until unit only lasted 45 seconds. Went on Dyson website to troubleshoot and they asked about flashing lights on the unit and the charger. Result of their troubleshoot was to buy another battery for $130.00. I should have bought a corded vacuum stick with more power at far less. For $500 you should get a heckuva lot more for your $ !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Burgess

customer_reviews.title: no cord
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it as it picks up our pets hair, but the suction head is small as is the collection container. My feeling is it is a great vacuum for small jobs. We have a small two bedroom 1,000 sq ft home. If I had to vacuum, I would opt out for a standard sized vacuum, which we do not have. My wife is very clean conscious and she is happy. The unit runs about 20 minutes on a full charge which is not enough to do the whole house. You may consider this for a second vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: PappyLove

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly well designed cordless vacuum, with multiple attachments that are very easy to change. With two large dogs, there is a lot of shed hair in the house, requiring daily vacuuming to keep the house clean, so ease and convenience is paramount. With the cordless vacuum, it is easy and quick to go through the whole house -- no having wrestle the cord and constantly switch wall sockets, as one must with a corded vacuum. The vacuum is also very effective in picking up pet hair. Not inexpensive, but worth the money given the amount of use it gets.
customer_reviews.author: S. Finlayson

customer_reviews.title: Bin too small for homes with furry pets
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, there is no way this can handle a home with indoor pets. The bin looks to hold about 1cup. I have an Akita and 2 cats. The bin will fill up in a few sweeps. Handy unit for little messes. In no way can this be used as your workhorse vacuum. I had to send it back, due to the cost and the fact that it is only going to be used occasionally. Too expensive to be a “hand vac”.
customer_reviews.author: LMT-G

customer_reviews.title: Good for somethings, but not all
customer_reviews.text: This works great on floors and low pile rugs, but 2 major complaints. 1) I cannot use on area rug that was a little thickness. Is their an attachment I can buy for rugs? 2 battery life is not long enough to get through my entire condo. Is there a backup battery that can be purchased? Fir the price if this vacuum it should be all purpose..
customer_reviews.author: Alice Harkin

customer_reviews.title: Best Anniversary Present!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this for us (me really) for our anniversary. I know, I'm nuts but he listened and I am happy so win-win! We have a small 1,000 sq foot beach cottage on the West Coast. No carpet or rugs but tile and laminate. I have two small dogs that shed dailllllly. I had a Shark vacuum before (w/cord) and while it worked it was heavier than this and I hated dealing with the cord. So pleased with this vacuum and he got an extra discount with it being Black Friday. Very easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love this Vac!!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to imagine loving a vacuum cleaner but this is a lovable Vac. It's light, it lasts long enough to vac our hardwood and rugs first floor and carpeted second floor. About 3000 Sq Ft. Great design, easy to empty charges fairly fast. Love the hanging rack and charger which we keep in the garage. Not sure if I like holding the trigger the whole time but it's not too tough on the finger. The canister could be a bit larger. All in all, it's the best of three Dyson's we own. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: RMigs

customer_reviews.title: Dyson does it right
customer_reviews.text: I have an upright animal dyson that I love. We recently moved and now have tons on stairs and it was just getting too hard to carry up and down so I bought a different less expensive similar vacuum. It works ok but it’s just not good enough for our house with kids, cats and a dog. I decided to buy this dyson (should have done to begin with) this gets the job done. Easy to clean out and all around great vacuum. The only reason it wasn’t 5stars is because the battery does die fairly quickly but it lasts long enough for me to do what I need to do, so it works great for myself
customer_reviews.author: Its me again

customer_reviews.title: Useless after just a few sucks
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to other reviews here! After maybe 10-20 minutes of total suck time, my $325 vacuum lasts approximately 10 seconds before completely shutting off. I'm now in the second round of warranty nonsense. They sent me a new charger, which did nothing (as expected), and now they're having me clean the pristine filter with water and let dry for 24 hours before moving forward. It seems pretty clear they are hoping I will just give up. The urge to break this thing into a million pieces may end up proving them right. Stay far, far away! Or at least use it a lot while you are within the Amazon return period!
customer_reviews.author: brian cooley-gilliom

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!  The accessory holder is sold separately which I found to be very tacky.
customer_reviews.text: A great vacuum. Easy to use easy to empty dirt. Hands never have to get near the dirt. Just hold over the garbage pail and pull a lever and the dirt is dumped. I do have one complaint. Shame on Dyson for not including a device to hold all of the accessories. You have to buy it separately. It was very disappointing to me that it wasn't included. That is why I didn't give it overall 5 stars. See picture: I was able to find hooks that I had in my house. The brown hook is something that I used instead of buying their accessory holder.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived DOA, beware of lemon product
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Got this product, charged it overnight and out of the box doesn’t work. When you press the trigger, no vacuum, just dead product. Now I’ve got to call Dyson tomorrow, what a hassle for such an expensive product. I had read the reviews before ordering, but I trusted the brand name, that was a mistake. Frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: SusanC.

customer_reviews.title: My husband rated this a great buy
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this earlier! It took some time to figure out where to install the charging base and store all the parts, but we are very pleased with this product. It works great on the floor, and especially convenient for the stairs as we have cats and fur balls are everywhere in the house. The cordless light unit for stairs means we can take it out and clean it much easier and frequently than before. Love this product. My husband loves it too and is helping with vacuum more frequently now because of the ease-of-use.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own one of these
customer_reviews.text: I (husband) hate to vacuum and I got this because I thought I'd use it more. Mostly because what we had was big and I hated unraveling the cord and wrap it back up for a small need. This is perfect! Mounted on the wall and changing, can take it off and vacuum up the dogs mess (or mine) and put it right back on the wall. My wife loves it as well and we got rid of our other one. But if we have a big job I still get out the Shop Vac.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: was really disappointed with the Dyson ball, but this vacuum is a monster. Has great suction. Very easy to use. Only complaint is the suction hole is a little narrow, but I'm sure its designed that way to increase suction. Has a small collection cup, but that is offset by the ease of emptying it. Makes cleanup a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Valdar76

customer_reviews.title: Love it:)
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to put together and use it. It is so convenient. I feel like hassle free. I used to think vacuum will have to wait for the weekend because it takes so much out of you just to get the vacuum out, unwind the wire, plug it then clean it. I think with this vacuum, I feel like I can vacuum everyday. Simple to clean. Only thing I wish was suction power was little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I heard great things only to be disappointed. I was told that this vacuum is great for people with pets. The first couple days it worked great. Now after having it for about 6 weeks, I’m very disappointed. It seems to only work right when it’s completely empty.. the tiniest bit of stuff in the compartment or any sort of resistance and the vacuum stops suctioning. We’ve cleaned the filters, taken it all apart, cleaned the attachments. Nothing seems to work. I either got a defective vacuum or this vacuum isn’t worth the money I spent. I’ll be looking for a new vacuum this month
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather!!
customer_reviews.text: Love using my dyson cordless!! My last vacuume weighed about 30lbs and I was constantly having to manhandle it to get my floors vacuumed. By the time I was done, I was exhausted. With my dyson, it is so light weight that I can zip over my floors and have energy to continue cleaning Hahaha. I highly recommend this light weight easy to use vacuum and would definitely recommend it to my family and friends, in fact I have.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: and they're soooo easy to snap in and out
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that I waited so long to buy this vacuum. After living through two others, this one is a dream. The attachments are the charm, and they're soooo easy to snap in and out. I am now able to get in corners, under tables, in the sofa tufts...the vac can go wherever the hair and dust are. Disposal is quick and efficient. I can vacuum up the dog hair in minutes...if I vacuum the rug, I need a bit more time. No complaints from me. I'm thrilled that I bought it. My small vacuum with attachments and its perpetually knotted cord is now history.
customer_reviews.author: Lillamo

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY!  Lackluster, overpriced vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very disappointed. As an mechanical engineer, I'd love to chat with the Dyson's engineers. Only way to vac anything up is to use it on max which kills battery life in 10-15 minutes (if you're lucky.) No hardwood floor attachments. The trap door design is garbage and when stored vertically, any debris you just vac'd up falls out. Attachments take time and precision to make up and is a bulky, unstreamlined design. I would never spend my money on Dyson again and am at the point where I actually hate this product. Happy to go back to corded for power and convenience of cleaning stuff up when I need to...not just when the battery is charged.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a bent wand and the trap on Easter container did not open. I returned it and bought one I could see at a store. Return was easy though.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, done
customer_reviews.text: Picks up better than any vacuum I’ve ever owned and I’ve been at it for 30 plus years. Yes, I own a 10 year old orange ball Dyson. Only minimal hair wraps around the beater bar, so cleaning that was easy. Because of the ease of this machine, find myself doing short runs multiple times a week, so keeping up rather than devoting 45 minutes at a time. Used the attachments for dusting a big ceiling fan with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mama12

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product in December 2017... Within two months ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in December 2017... Within two months the motor had stopped rotating... And July 2018 the base fell off...had registered the vacuum with Dyson called support... And told me it wasn’t under warranty and I would have to spend another $79 to buy a new motor had... Don’t do business with Dyson not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this product. The battery dies at the 2 year mark but does it slowly so run time starts at 40 minutes then you get 20 then 10 then 5 minutes and finally the battery just dies. The warranty on it is only 1 year and to replace it is $130. Dyson's customer service is terrible and they do not help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Battery life isn’t good
customer_reviews.text: It’s light weight. Cordless makes it awesome. And it’s easy to empty. The only thing I do not like is the battery life. It’s just extremely inconvenient. It turns off after about 15 minutes on high suction which I feel it needs to be on. There has to be something wrong with the one I received. I will be returning it for another one to see if maybe the one I got was defective. If it’s the same, then it’s just not worth it for cordless.
customer_reviews.author: jackie mattera

customer_reviews.title: This is more comfortable to hold than the earlier version I had and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, surprisingly quiet. A solid improvement over earlier models. This is more comfortable to hold than the earlier version I had and the top filter has a seal around it so it the filter doesn't fall out if the unit is turned upside down. Very powerful, works great on dog hair and the rotating head can even get dog hair out of cloth car seats. Only thing I would change is that the canister is smaller than than the last model and needs to be emptied more often. I do like the way it empties though. It's less convenient to open but makes it easy to dump hair and lint out without having to pull it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It's so light weight and versatile. I use it every day. I have cats and it is excellent for picking up their hair on furniture. It gets into little nooks and crannies, reaches the ceiling for spider webs, and has an attachment that works well.for baseboards. Overall very happy with my purchase. Only reason it gets 4 stars is because you have to hold the button down the entire time your vacuuming. On the one hand this is nice because you can let go when you need to reposition or use a different attachment. On the other hand, it can cause your finger to cramp up. Seems like there could be a better solution for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Take👏🏻My👏🏻Money👏🏻
customer_reviews.text: Best decision of my life. Yes, my partner was mad I bought it because it isn’t cheap and we are on a budget BUT it legit will gross you out in the best way. I vacuumed my carpet with my old shark and then re-vacuumed with this baby and it filled up the canister with one go-round. I also have noticed a difference with air quality in the house. If you are on the fence or looking at the animal vs. absolute. We have all hard floor with rugs and this is fantastic oh both. It would be nice to have the fluffy head BUT this is just fine! I recommend 1000%
customer_reviews.author: JBowen

customer_reviews.title: HUSKY MOM APPROVED 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Five stars, and two thumbs way up. Having a husky guarantees you an almost constantly hairy home. This vacuum is unbelievable. Sucks all the hair up in one forward and back motion, doesn’t leave a strand behind. So easy to use, and light weight. Hair doesn’t get stuck on the roller at all. It is also incredibly easy to empty. No more digging in the big tank to pull out clumps of dusty dirty hair. I am in love with a vacuum cleaner y’all.
customer_reviews.author: Courtnam

customer_reviews.title: Piece of JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Used only once charged battery before use as directed tried to use a couple weeks and battery is dead !!!! called for service they said charger was bad! after 1week new charger arrived still don't work called again! now battery is bad they will send new one still waiting would send the piece of JUNK BACK!if time hadent expired! standing in closet doing nothing $300.00 wasted
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: YOU'RE BETTER OFF WITH A BISSELL OR SHARK
customer_reviews.text: Horrible battery life! Runs for 15 minutes! Not impressed with it being a pet vac at all! Came dented! Wouldn't even pick up Christmas tree needles. Definitely NOT worth the $$$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Rick F

customer_reviews.title: Two dogs no problems!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. We have two golden labs that love to shed, this thing handles all of the hair that they produce no problem. It is so convenient that vacuuming is not a chore. You just grab it do a little bit and then put it back, the hair doesn’t get a chance to build up. Can’t beat it for suction, it has a bunch of different attachments, it is super light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Colin D.

customer_reviews.title: this was new  uneatable use it once e
customer_reviews.text: this will not stay on gets hot get about ten min vacuum the then turns of Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Dolores S.

customer_reviews.title: Fussy Brother Recommended
customer_reviews.text: With all new wood floors to take care of, I had no idea what would make my life the easiest, but also keep them looking fantastic. My brother recommended buying a Dyson and I am so glad I took his advice! It's so easy to use, picks up anything we can throw at it, and the charge lasts long enough to sweep 3-4 rooms. By the way...battery power is the way to go...its amazing not having a cord on the sweeper. The only downside is I had to order a tool ($100 extra) without a beater bar due to an area rug in need of delicate treatment.
customer_reviews.author: granolachic

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Worth every penney. I save so much time vacuuming now that i don’t have to plug in all over the house it’s a time saver for sure. I was a little skeptical because of the size and having to recharge for hours if it went out but that hasn’t happened to me yet and cleaning it out is a breeze.I use this product on tile and carpet and I recommend this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the battery does not last long at all makes me hate it. And it takes forever to charge
customer_reviews.author: B. Casale

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Dyson vacuum I've bought. All of them are still working great. The nicest feature of V7 and up is the dustbin cleaning mechanism. V6s, you had to stick your hand or piece of paper into the dustbin to try to get stuff out or completely detach the dustbin. There wasn't an easy quick-empty function that worked well. Not the most elegant solution. This one, however, doesn't have that issue. Great engineering. I'm not sure about the later models yet but I'm sure they've tweaked the use cases and have made even more improvements. My biggest worry, as with every battery powered device, is the life-cycle of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tan

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now and so far, so good. The button to power it is a little annoying but get the design so that if you take your finger off power isn’t used. Packaging did say higher suction power only lasts 10 (?) minutes accurate whatever the number. Foot part could be flatter to go under more furniture more easily but it’s use is primarily quick clean throughout the house. Power does last if on the lower suction function and we have a 2300 sq foot house, little carpeting. Works well on the little bit of carpeting we have. Absolutely picks up animal hair-we have 3 dogs!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Not Dyson standards
customer_reviews.text: I love Dyson products and owned a number of them, but this cordless vacuum has been a deception. It's heavy, difficult to manage and the suction at normal level is not good. You need to leave it at Max Suction which drains the battery very fast. The dustbin is not easy to open with one hand and often spreads dust all over the place. WHile it has more than 2 accessories there is no way to stick them to the wall mount unit and so you end up not knowing where to store them. I am not satisfied with this purchase and seriously considering asking for a refund. Not surprised it is always on sale.
customer_reviews.author: CSC1709

customer_reviews.title: The best quality vacuum. Needs increase the battery capacity
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to install, you even don't need to read the instruction manual. Carefully looking at the motor filter cartridge very clean, so It is brand new not the refurbish. Consult the custom service if it needs be fully charged first time, the answer is yes. The suction is strong enough. The released wind also felt clean and the motor sound was slightly louder than expected, but it was acceptable and slightly smaller than the sweeping robot. The only drawback is that it charges for five hours but only can use six minutes on the high-speed mode.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, battery short lived
customer_reviews.text: I have a 100lb Newfoundland poodle mix, and this vacuum really helps me keep up with him. It's lightweight, the attachments are conveniently and easily stored on the charging station. I like the reusable filters, and I the suction is powerful enough to keep the hair out of my shag carpet in the living room. My only complaint is that after two years of use, the battery is only lasting me about 2 minutes. Replacements are expensive ($40-50), so that was a disappointment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Markwardt

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Also have V 7. This is more powerful than V7 but like them both. Cool thing can connect the 2 wands and make really long tool to vacuum height wall return vents. ..Very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Dr. W. Kirt Nichols

customer_reviews.title: works for 15 seconds
customer_reviews.text: I just got for Christmas and it operates for 15 seconds and done. Recharge and same thing. Actually called dyson and the serial number on the unit was identified as a refurbished unit and only 6 month warranty compared to buying from Dyson direct with a 2 year warranty. Don't recall seeing refurbished from this seller listed anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dyson cordless isn’t worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum from Dyson three years ago. Exactly a year after the warranty expired, the fully charged battery would only allow me to run the vacuum for one minute and forty seconds. My corded Dyson has lasted me almost 15 years without a problem. Dyson is worth the investment for a corded vacuum, but for $500 a cordless vacuum replacement battery shouldn’t cost $129 in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nevart

customer_reviews.title: love my Dyson Animal Cordless
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum... my first Dyson. The only negative is that you have to hold in the trigger as you vacuum, which is a little annoying & hard on your arm. It works better in my left hand, so that helps a bit. Nevertheless, this is FAR superior to any other cordless vacuum I have ever owned (probably have had around 10 over the years). Love the design as well. Does it pick up EVERY dog hair I encounter on my sofa or carpet? No, but it picks up WAY MORE than my previous vacuums did.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowOfYourSmile

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH THIS PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum! I have a German Shepherd and am in a constant battle with dog hair. This vacuum needs one pass and there is no more hair. Completely versatile with all the attachments, extremely easy to swap attachments. My ONLY con with this vacuum is the battery life but that's what you get when you decide to purchase a cordless. It may seem silly, but I no longer dread cleaning my house. I'd buy again in a heartbeat and will always use Dyson for my vacuuming needs. What are you waiting for! Buy it! (I was not compensated in any way for my review, I am just an extremely happy costumer.)
customer_reviews.author: Torree

customer_reviews.title: can't even finish a room before it dyes ?
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum works fine for the time its working. Most people love there Dyson cordless. Mine literally works for 15 minutes before it shots off... I'll contact Dyson and let you know how they handle it. I would like to add that when I called about my dyson a new one was immediatly sent out. Also, Dyson contacted me about my concerns. I would add 3 stars for that!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mailloux

product_meta.title: Dyson V8 Animal Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Iron
product_meta.description: The Dyson V8 animal offers cord-free hassle-free cleaning for up to 40 minutes. Powered by the Dyson V8 motor, this machine has the most powerful suction of any cordless vacuum. Whole machine filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air than the air you breathe. Max power mode provides up to 7 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks. All Dyson cord-free vacuums convert to a handheld for quick clean UPS, spot cleaning, and cleaning difficult places. Emptying the new, larger bin is a breeze with the push of a single button. The convenient docking station stores and charges your machine and accessories when not in use so it's always ready to go. Up to 40 minutes of powerful suction (up to 25 minutes with motorized floor tool attached). Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning. Powered by the Dyson digital motor V8, it creates the most powerful cordless vacuum. The direct-drive cleaner head drives bristles deep into the carpet to remove ground-in dirt. It has 150 percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cord-free vacuum. Mini motorized tool for tough tasks. Stiff nylon bristles remove pet hair and ground-in dirt from furniture, car seats and tight spaces. Whole machine HEPA filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air than the air you breathe. Transforms to a handheld for beyond the floor cleaning. Hygienic dirt ejector empties dust from the bin in a single action. 2 tier Radial cyclones - 15 cyclones, arranged across two tiers, work in parallel to increase airflow and capture fine dust. Max power mode provides up to 7 minutes of higher suction for more difficult tasks. Mini soft dusting brush for gentle dusting around the home. Balanced for cleaning up top, down below and in between. All Dyson cordless vacuums quickly convert to a handheld for quick clean UPS, spot cleaning and cleaning difficult places. 1 tested to ASTM F558 against cordless models. Dyson received the highest numerical score among stick vacuums in the J. D. Power 2017 Vacuum Satisfaction Study, based on 6, 965 total responses from 7 companies measuring the opinions of consumers who purchased a stick vacuum in the previous 12 months surveyed in February-March 2017. Your experiences may vary.
feature_bullets: Cord free; Hassle free; Powerful suction; Washable lifetime filter
Up to 40 minutes run time when using a non-motorized tool
Lightweight and versatile, for easy home cleaning; Instant release trigger means battery power is only used while it’s cleaning; Requires charging for 4 hours minimum before first use
Direct drive cleaner head; Up to 8 minutes of fade free power (in Max mode); Drives stiff nylon bristles into carpets to capture deep down dirt

Designed to deep clean homes with pets; Whole machine filtration captures allergens and expels cleaner air than the air you breathe; Up to 25 minutes of working time with motorized floor tool attached
Powered by the Dyson digital motor V8 and engineered to pick up ground in dirt and fine dust from hard floors and carpets
150 percent more brush bar power than the Dyson V6 cordless vacuum
Hygienic bin emptying : No need to touch the dirt; Bin volume 0.14 gallons

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,077 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Floor, Ceiling, Carpet, Car and Stair
